law.catch_line: Residential Gas Appliances; Sale Or Installation

text.section: Sell or offer for sale by advertisement or otherwise or display for sale of gas appliances for use in, or in connection with, a residence.
Install or cause to be installed a gas appliance in a residence.
Import into the commonwealth a gas appliance for use in, or in connection with, a residence.
Deliver in the commonwealth after sale or pursuant to a contract for a sale of a gas appliance for use in, or in connection with, a residence.

Sell or display for sale an automatic gas appliance, for use in, or in connection with a residence, unless such automatic gas appliance is labeled in a manner visible to the purchaser or prospective purchaser with the words “intermittent ignition”.
